file_content.text: Operative Che'nash, offering wishes of fortune.
Intercepted message, assault on Talz commando camp. Shatterstorm intelligence retrieved?
Uploading to Imperial Command.
Shrikaansi Reconnaissance Company contract fulfilled. Time, perhaps, to depart Ilum.
Report to Grand Moff Regus for new orders. Shatterstorm was useful, and you'll continue to serve.
No... you're working for us.
But the contract--!
Proposal is... acceptable. I will report for further Imperial operations.
Be my guest.
We don't need your sort.
Understood. I will arrange transport shortly.
Additional Shatterstorm intelligence near Talz commando camp. Recommend caution, full assault for retrieval.
You are with the military?
I am mercenary attachment, yes. Operative Che'nash, of Shrikaansi Reconnaissance Company. Hostile environment expertise.
Mercenary presence is stopgap only while appropriate forces transferred from Hoth, Ando Prime. Meanwhile, I serve humbly.
Give me a report.
Should I know your species?
Species is known as Geran; suit is for protection and breathing apparatus, not meant as insult.
The Empire doesn't even like hiring Mandalorians. Now they're using independent mercs?
Guess the Empire's desperate.
Refrain from political discussion, please, so as not to affect business.
We shouldn't need to hire outsiders for an operation like this.
Mercenaries? This is pathetic.
Understand reluctance, but I do not set policy.
Have completed present objective: monitoring Republic communications, identified planned operation code-named "Shatterstorm."
Unfortunate, Shatterstorm details unknown. Communications traced to Talz commando camp. Believe Talz integral to Shatterstorm.
This prototype weapon--what does it do?
What is "Shatterstorm"?
That's a matter for Command.
Willing to split bonus for additional intelligence; I provide location, you provide firepower.
Employer-officers recently disintegrated during Republic assault. Still, have contract to be fulfilled.
Recommend, if possible, prevention of Shatterstorm attack. More intelligence required for Imperial forces to act.
Transferring location of Talz communication grid now. Wish best fortune to operation.
Try harder. [Refuse quest]
I will... begin renegotiating terms of contract.
Now analyzing reconnaissance data. Will provide results within contractually obligated time.
Special forces mean trouble.
Communications grid at Talz commando camp primary target. Intelligence retrieval too hazardous for myself and Shrikaansi Reconnaissance Company.
Easy enough for me.
I expect a reward.
Reward is promised, upon successful delivery of Shatterstorm intelligence.
Perhaps they're just chatty.
Intercepts from multiple border posts. Talz commandos special forces, Shatterstorm special operation.
